statements: SELECT * FROM PatientDemographics WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM PatientDemographics WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM PatientDemographics ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT gender FROM PatientDemographics;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PatientDemographics WHERE age > 50;
SELECT first_name, last_name, address FROM PatientDemographics WHERE patient_id <= 10;
SELECT patient_id, age FROM PatientDemographics WHERE gender = 'Female';

SELECT * FROM PatientDemographics WHERE age BETWEEN 30 AND 40;
SELECT AVG(age) AS avg_age FROM PatientDemographics;
SELECT * FROM PatientDemographics WHERE last_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT MIN(age) AS min_age FROM PatientDemographics WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name FROM PatientDemographics LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM PatientDemographics WHERE age < 18 AND gender = 'Female';
SELECT patient_id, age, address FROM PatientDemographics WHERE last_name = 'Smith';
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT gender) FROM PatientDemographics;
SELECT * FROM PatientDemographics WHERE age = (SELECT MAX(age) FROM PatientDemographics);
SELECT AVG(age) AS avg_female_age FROM PatientDemographics WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM PatientDemographics WHERE first_name = 'John' AND last_name = 'Doe';
SELECT patient_id, gender FROM PatientDemographics WHERE address IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM PatientDemographics WHERE age > 60 AND gender = 'Male'
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM PatientDemographics WHERE age BETWEEN 30 AND 40
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PatientDemographics WHERE gender = 'Female'
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name FROM PatientDemographics WHERE address LIKE '%Main Street%'
SELECT MAX(age) AS max_age FROM PatientDemographics
SELECT AVG(age) AS avg_age FROM PatientDemographics WHERE gender = 'Male'
SELECT * FROM PatientDemographics ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT DISTINCT gender FROM PatientDemographics
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT gender) AS gender_count FROM PatientDemographics
SELECT * FROM PatientDemographics WHERE first_name LIKE 'J%' AND last_name LIKE 'D%'
SELECT patient_id, CONCAT(first_name, ' ', last_name) AS full_name FROM PatientDemographics
SELECT * FROM PatientDemographics WHERE age = (SELECT MAX(age) FROM PatientDemographics)
SELECT AVG(age) AS avg_age_female, AVG(age) AS avg_age_male FROM PatientDemographics GROUP BY gender
SELECT first_name, last_name, age, address FROM PatientDemographics WHERE age > (SELECT AVG(age) FROM PatientDemographics)
SELECT * FROM PatientDemographics WHERE age IN (SELECT age FROM PatientDemographics GROUP BY age HAVING COUNT(*) > 1)
SELECT patient_id, age + 5 AS age_after_5_years FROM PatientDemographics
SELECT first_name, last_name, CONCAT(address, ', Age: ', age) AS full_info FROM PatientDemographics
SELECT * FROM PatientDemographics WHERE length(first_name) > length(last_name)
SELECT * FROM PatientDemographics WHERE first_name = 'John' OR last_name = 'Doe'
SELECT * FROM PatientDemographics WHERE gender = 'Male' OR gender = 'Female'
SELECT * FROM PatientDemographics WHERE gender IN ('Male', 'Female')

SELECT * FROM health_records;
SELECT record_id, patient_id, date_of_visit, diagnosis FROM health_records;

SELECT patient_name, date_of_visit, diagnosis FROM patients JOIN health_records ON patients.patient_id = health_records.patient_id;
SELECT date_of_birth, diagnosis FROM patients JOIN health_records ON patients.patient_id = health_records.patient_id;

SELECT * FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM health_records WHERE blood_pressure LIKE '%120/80%';
SELECT * FROM health_records WHERE heart_rate > 100;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_visit FROM patients JOIN health_records ON patients.patient_id = health_records.patient_id WHERE diagnosis = 'Fever';
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM patients JOIN health_records ON patients.patient_id = health_records.patient_id WHERE blood_pressure LIKE '%130/90%';
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, diagnosis FROM patients JOIN health_records ON patients.patient_id = health_records.patient_id WHERE date_of_birth > '1980-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, heart_rate FROM patients JOIN health_records ON patients.patient_id = health_records.patient_id WHERE diagnosis = 'Hypertension' AND heart_rate > 120;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM health_records;
SELECT AVG(heart_rate) AS average_heart_rate FROM health_records;
SELECT patient_name, MAX(heart_rate) AS max_heart_rate FROM patients JOIN health_records ON patients.patient_id = health_records.patient_id;
SELECT patient_name, MIN(heart_rate) AS min_heart_rate FROM patients JOIN health_records ON patients.patient_id = health_records.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2000-12-31';
SELECT patient_id, date_of_visit, diagnosis FROM health_records WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%';
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, diagnosis FROM patients JOIN health_records ON patients.patient_id = health_records.patient_id;
SELECT COUNT(patient_id) AS total_patients FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, blood_pressure FROM patients JOIN health_records ON patients.patient_id = health_records.patient_id WHERE blood_pressure > '120/80';
SELECT * FROM health_records ORDER BY date_of_visit DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT patient_name, AVG(heart_rate) AS avg_heart_rate FROM patients JOIN health_records ON patients.patient_id = health_records.patient_id GROUP BY patient_id;
SELECT patient_name, MAX(heart_rate) AS max_heart_rate FROM patients JOIN health_records ON patients.patient_id = health_records.patient_id GROUP BY patient_id;
SELECT DISTINCT gender FROM patients;

SELECT patient_name, date_of_visit, diagnosis, blood_pressure, heart_rate FROM patients JOIN health_records ON patients.patient_id = health_records.patient_id WHERE date_of_visit > '2021-01-01' AND gender = 'Female';
SELECT patient_name, COUNT(record_id) AS num_visits FROM patients JOIN health_records ON patients.patient_id = health_records.patient_id GROUP BY patient_id HAVING num_visits > 2;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM patients LEFT JOIN health_records ON patients.patient_id = health_records.patient_id WHERE health_records.patient_id IS NULL;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_visit, diagnosis FROM patients RIGHT JOIN health_records ON patients.patient_id = health_records.patient_id WHERE patients.patient_id IS NULL;
SELECT patient_name, AVG(DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), date_of_birth)/365) AS avg_age FROM patients GROUP BY patient_id HAVING avg_age > 50;
SELECT gender, COUNT(patient_id) AS num_patients FROM patients GROUP BY gender HAVING num_patients > 5;
SELECT AVG(heart_rate) AS avg_heart_rate, MAX(heart_rate) AS max_heart_rate, MIN(heart_rate) AS min_heart_rate FROM health_records;

SELECT gender, COUNT(patient_id) AS num_patients, SUM(CASE WHEN gender = 'Male' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS num_males, SUM(CASE WHEN gender = 'Female' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS num_females FROM patients GROUP BY gender;
SELECT patient_name, MAX(DATE_FORMAT(date_of_birth, '%Y')) AS oldest_birth_year FROM patients GROUP BY patient_id;

SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM patients LEFT JOIN health_records ON patients.patient_id = health_records.patient_id WHERE health_records.patient_id IS NULL OR health_records.date_of_visit < '2021-01-01';

SELECT p.patient_name, p.age, hr.height, hr.weight FROM patients p JOIN health_records hr ON p.patient_id = hr.patient_id;
SELECT p.patient_name, p.age, pd.location_name, pd.total_population FROM patients p JOIN population_data pd ON p.patient_id = pd.location_id;
SELECT patient_name, age, last_visit_date FROM patients ORDER BY last_visit_date DESC;

SELECT patient_name, age, last_visit_date FROM patients WHERE last_visit_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT location_name, total_population FROM population_data WHERE total_population > 1000000;

SELECT p.patient_name, hr.record_date, hr.height, hr.weight, pd.avg_age FROM patients p JOIN health_records hr ON p.patient_id = hr.patient_id JOIN population_data pd ON p.patient_id = pd.location_id;

SELECT patient_name, address, education_level, average_income FROM patients p JOIN demographics d ON p.patient_id = d.patient_id JOIN population_stats ps ON d.patient_id = ps.stat_id WHERE ps.average_income > 50000;

SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, ethnicity, health_score FROM patients p JOIN demographics d ON p.patient_id = d.patient_id JOIN population_stats ps ON d.patient_id = ps.stat_id WHERE ps.health_score > 80;

SELECT patient_name, ethnicity, income_range, average_income FROM patients p JOIN demographics d ON p.patient_id = d.patient_id JOIN population_stats ps ON d.patient_id = ps.stat_id WHERE ps.average_income < 30000;

SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, ethnicity, diagnosis, prescription FROM patients p JOIN demographics d ON p.patient_id = d.patient_id JOIN health_records h ON d.patient_id = h.patient_id WHERE diagnosis='COVID-19';

SELECT patient_name, gender, address, diagnosis, average_income FROM patients p JOIN health_records h ON p.patient_id = h.patient_id JOIN population_stats ps ON h.patient_id = ps.stat_id WHERE ps.average_income > 60000;

SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, ethnicity, education_level, health_score FROM patients p JOIN demographics d ON p.patient_id = d.patient_id JOIN population_stats ps ON d.patient_id = ps.stat_id WHERE ps.health_score < 50;
SELECT patient_name, gender, address, diagnosis, prescription FROM patients p JOIN health_records h ON p.patient_id = h.patient_id WHERE prescription LIKE '%pain%' AND diagnosis LIKE '%infection%';

SELECT patient_name, gender, address, diagnosis, prescription FROM patients p JOIN health_records h ON p.patient_id = h.patient_id WHERE prescription LIKE '%antibiotic%' AND diagnosis LIKE '%infection%';
